ygData.subject: Re: gypsy camps
ygData.msgSnippet: While I don t currently have a Combine 2H Sword, if it follows the general rule it will be the same stats as your Fine Steel but magical.  This is how it goes:
ygData.messageBody:
While I don't currently have a Combine 2H Sword, if it follows the general
rule it will be the same stats as your Fine Steel but magical. This is how it
goes:
(I could be off a little on the speed)
Rusty 9, 50
Tarnished 9, 48
Bronze 9, 46
Retail 12, 45
Fine Steel 12, 43
Combine 12, 43 Magical
Well Balanced 14, 41 Magical

If I am wrong on the speeds feel free to post a correction.

Tim West wrote:

> From: "Tim West" <twest@...>
>
> Anyone using a combine 2 handed sword yet ? What are the stats for them
> and what can you expect to hit for with it. I am outgrowing my fine steel
> 2 handed sword and would like to make sure that it is worth getting a
> combine. My fine steel hits for 25Hp max.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> ONElist members are using Shared Files in great ways!
> http://www.onelist.com
> Are you? If not, see our homepage for details.
